sys_update_version.payload: customcbody { font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; margin: 0; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f5f7fa, #c3cfe2); } .hero-section { text-align: center; padding: 20px; border-radius: 15px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-in-out; } .hero-section h1 { color: #343434; font-size: 4rem; margin: 0; font-weight: bold; background: -webkit-linear-gradient(#ff7e5f, #feb47b); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; animation: textGlow 2s infinite alternate; } .hero-section h3 { color: #5E5E5E; font-size: 1.5rem; text-align: center; margin-top: 20px; animation: slideIn 1.5s ease-in-out; } @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.95); } to { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); } } @keyframes textGlow { from { text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 126, 95, 0.8), 0 0 20px rgba(255, 126, 95, 0.8), 0 0 30px rgba(255, 126, 95, 0.8), 0 0 40px rgba(255, 126, 95, 0.8); } to { text-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(254, 180, 123, 0.8), 0 0 30px rgba(254, 180, 123, 0.8), 0 0 40px rgba(254, 180, 123, 0.8), 0 0 50px rgba(254, 180, 123, 0.8); } } @keyframes slideIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }sp_instancetruelms_main_container_1falseLMS Main Container 1truefalsesp_widgetpranav.k2024-05-23 07:14:29275b55d6939a4210b09bf2918bba105623LMS Main Container 19fa9ee7f93650210b09bf2918bba106b9fa9ee7f93650210b09bf2918bba106bsp_widget_275b55d6939a4210b09bf2918bba1056pranav.k2024-05-30 05:42:58
